name: Fancy Fish Dreamscape
description:
Having nightmares? You might as well be fancy and jump into the world of Fancy Fish Dreamscape!

Fancy Fish is having nightmares and it's up to you, the player, to help him survive as long as possible in four surreal stylized environments full of all types of oncoming hazards. Inspired by titles from the early days of arcade cabinets and happy go lucky mascots of said era, Fancy Fish Dreamscape is a title meant to hearken back to the days of simple to pick up and play arcade games to relieve stress and have good old fashioned fun with musical tunes that will have your feet tap to the beat!

Can you best the nightmares and get an admirable high score? Only you will know the answer to this very question when you play Fancy Fish Dreamscape!
